questions.question: A data scientist requires access to an Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) bucket containing training data from an Amazon SageMaker notebook instance running within a VPC. Which approaches should they use to enable secure access to the S3 bucket?
options: Configure an Internet Gateway in the VPC to allow outbound internet access from the notebook instance to the S3 bucket.
Configure a VPC endpoint for Amazon S3 in the VPC and use the endpoint to access the S3 bucket.
Configure a NAT Gateway in the VPC to allow outbound internet access from the notebook instance to the S3 bucket.
Configure a bastion host in a public subnet and access the S3 bucket through the bastion host.
correct_answers: Configure a VPC endpoint for Amazon S3 in the VPC and use the endpoint to access the S3 bucket.
